org.pepstock.charba.client.commons

Class PropertyKeyChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.PropertyKeyChecker

  • final class PropertyKeyChecker
extends Object
    This utility checks if the property key is acceptable or not.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

        static boolean isValid(String id)
        Returns true if the passed id is compliant with the constraints of property key.
        A scale id
        • can not contain any non-URL-safe characters
        • cannot contain upper case letters
